title: Ep. 38 "The Golden Girls"
description:
This week Medinah's mom Miss Gina and her cousin Connie join us to drop some wisdom on us. Ladies stop "playing house" demand what you want! That's just one piece of advice, but there's so many gems in this one! They schooled us on shacking up with men and playing the role of a wife with out actually being one. Listen as these seasoned ladies join us to break down the differences of dating then and now.

Share your thoughts with us @cocktalespodcast and use the hashtag #cocktalespodcast

Follow us at
